Goblin.name: Goblin
Goblin.specialMechanics: Deals 2x damage to resource buildings (Gold Mines, Elixir Collectors, Dark Elixir Drills, Gold Storages, Elixir Storages, Dark Elixir Storage, Town Hall, Clan Castle). Prioritizes resource buildings over all other targets.

Wall Breaker.name: Wall Breaker
Wall Breaker.specialMechanics: Deals 40x damage to Walls. Targets the nearest Wall segment. Self-destructs on impact, dealing splash damage. Also has death damage if killed before reaching target.

Balloon.name: Balloon
Balloon.specialMechanics: Death damage (drops bomb on death dealing splash damage in 1.2 tile radius). Targets defenses exclusively until all are destroyed. Flying unit.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.specialMechanics: Heals friendly ground troops instead of dealing damage. Cannot target or heal air troops. Healing effectiveness is reduced on Heroes (approximately 50-70% of standard rate, varies by level). Healers are targeted by Air Defenses. Multiple Healers have diminishing returns (each additional Healer heals less).

P.E.K.K.A.name: P.E.K.K.A
P.E.K.K.A.specialMechanics: Takes 2x damage from Hidden Tesla (no longer applies in current versions, was removed).

Baby Dragon.name: Baby Dragon
Baby Dragon.specialMechanics: Tantrum ability: When no other allied air troops are within 4.5 tiles, the Baby Dragon becomes enraged, gaining 100% increased damage and 50% faster attack speed (effective 3x DPS).

Miner.name: Miner
Miner.specialMechanics: Burrows underground to move between buildings, passing under Walls and becoming invisible/untargetable while moving. Cannot be damaged or trigger Traps while underground.

Electro Dragon.name: Electro Dragon
Electro Dragon.specialMechanics: Chain lightning attack that hits the primary target then bounces to up to 4 additional targets, with each successive bounce dealing 20% less damage. On death, releases chain lightning bolts that strike nearby ground randomly.

Yeti.name: Yeti
Yeti.specialMechanics: Spawns Yetimites when destroyed. Number of Yetimites increases with level (8 at level 1, increasing by 1 per level). Yetimites also spawn periodically as the Yeti takes damage (one per 600 damage accumulated). Yetimites deal high single-target damage then die after one hit.

Dragon Rider.name: Dragon Rider
Dragon Rider.specialMechanics: When the dragon is destroyed, it deals death damage in a 2-tile radius. The rider then dismounts and continues fighting on the ground with reduced stats.

Electro Titan.name: Electro Titan
Electro Titan.specialMechanics: Has a passive electrical aura that continuously damages all nearby buildings and troops within a 7-tile radius while the Electro Titan is alive. The aura deals damage to both ground and air targets.

Root Rider.name: Root Rider
Root Rider.specialMechanics: Rides a large root that crashes through Walls, destroying them on contact. Wall destruction speed varies by Wall level: lower-level Walls are destroyed instantly, higher-level Walls take 0.4s to 1.2s. The root ignores Walls during movement.

Thrower.name: Thrower
Thrower.specialMechanics: Hurls mighty spears from long range at enemies and Defenses. Has the longest attack range of any standard elixir troop at 6 tiles.
